file_content.text: New graphics settings are available - re-calibrate your settings for optimal performance?
You must close the preferences page before updating your graphics settings in this manner.
You have successfully updated your graphics settings.
Update graphics settings cancelled: you may do this at any time from the Preferences: Graphics menu.
Continue to play game sounds, even when the game is minimized
Enable/Disable frame by frame viewing of unread tutorials.
Hide Guild Login and Logoff Messages
Even if eligible to auto-join a web guild, do not display the guild import offer dialog
Deselect Target upon Clicking on Terrain
Map Flashes Red while being Attacked
Automatically pick up all loot on right-click
Automatically target yourself with abilities and effects when applicable
The maximum distance you can pull the camera away from your character
Modifies how fast the camera rotates around your character
If enabled, you will deselect your target when you click on the terrain
Invert the direction your mouse moves the camera horizontally
Invert the direction your mouse moves the camera vertically
Display flytext for ability damage that you have caused
Display flytext for ability damage that has hit your companions
Display flytext for ability damage that has hit you
Display flytext for your companion's misses
Display flytext for misses from people not in your group or your companions
Display flytext for your companion's damage
Display flytext for damage inflicted on your companion
Display flytext for damage inflicted on you
Display flytext for negative effects you have gained
Display flytext for positive effects you have gained
Display flytext for negative effects you have lost
Display flytext for positive effects you have lost
Display flytext for ability damage that your companion has caused
Display flytext for healing that your companion has caused
Display flytext for healing that people not in your group has caused
Display flytext for healing that someone in your group has caused
Display flytext for healing that you have caused
Display flytext showing a low health warning for your companion
Display flytext showing a low health warning for yourself
Display flytext for damage mitigation by your companion
Display flytext for damage mitigation by people not in your group
Display flytext for damage you have mitigated
Restrict flytext display to always fit on the screen
Display flytext for experience you have gained
Turn on and off the cloth physics simulation
Adjust gamma correction while in full screen mode
Specificies the quality of shadows. Low will only render a blob shadow on the player and High renders full environment shadows. Reducing this will increase your performance.
Turn on or off specular lighting
Turn on or off vertical sync
Turn on or off windowed mode
Turn on or off color blind mode
Display the extra action bar five
Display the extra action bar four
Display the extra action bar three
Display the extra action bar two
Enable subtitles for non-alien conversation participants
Turn on or off the map fading while you are moving
When you enter combat with the map up it will flash red to indicate you are in combat.
Display nameplates on enemy player companions
Display nameplates on friendly player companions
Display a nameplate on your character
Filter all profanity out of player chats
The player is playing in multiplayer, solo or ask conversation mode

Right-click: Assigns right-click to request companions to gather resources. SHIFT + right-click will be used for players to gather resources.
SHIFT + right-click: Assigns SHIFT + right-click to request companions to gather resources. Right-click will be used for players to gather resources.
Disabled: Companion gathering is disabled. Assigns right-click for players to gather resources.
Display time stamps on all combat log messages
Include messages about nearby action in the combat log.
Include messages about actions benefitting you in the combat log.
Include messages about actions harming you in the combat log.
Include messages about effects and abilities in the combat log.
Include messages about your point (Force, rage, etc.) spending and restoration actions in the combat log.
Adjust your texture quality. Reducing this will increase your performance.
Display other player's chat over head
Allow display of chat messages over character's head.
Display your character's chat over head.
Display chat over your own head.
Visibility of group member mission map notes.
Exterior Map Defaults to World Map
If the player is outside, the world map will open instead of the local map.
Exclude all NPCs from any keyboard-initiated targeting
Cast on friendly targets' enemy target
Allows hotkey usage for secondary targets
Auto target the closest enemy when using an offensive ability
If you are outside, open the world map instead of the local map.
Do you really want to reset your preferences to default?
Detach camera from the character when it hits the terrain
Allow Access to Same Class/Personal Phases
Toggle allow access to same class/personal phases
Toggle displaying phase gate help tips
Enable Magnifying Glass in World Map
Toggle on or off the display of the in-phase indicator.
Selecting this option will display more detailed information about the modifications installed in an item.
Turning this option on will show comparative tooltips for your companion.
Enable Stat Summarization in Item Tooltips
Turning this option on will summarize the statistical effect of switching an item with what is currently equipped in that slot.
Turning this option on will show tooltips for the gear you have equipped when you mouse over an item someplace else.
Turning this option on will prevent you or others from seeing any gear equipped in your head slot, such as helmets or masks. Will also disable voice modifications enabled by helmets.
Toggle on to make all visible garments coordinate their color scheme with your currently worn chest piece.
Automatically skips character creation and introduction movies.
Plays an audible tone when your name is said in the following chat channels: Tell, Guild and Ops. If you have heard an audible tone in the last 30 seconds, you won't hear one.
Plays an audible tone when a friend, group or guild member logs on.
Toggle displaying a warning that item modifications that are overwritten are destroyed.
Toggle displaying a warning that Commendation Tokens spent to purchase items cannot be refunded
The quickslot is replaced by the companion bar when it is in expanded mode.
Intensity of light glow. Toggle off for a performance gain.
Focus effects during conversations. Toggle off for a performance gain.
Adjust rendering quality. Reducing this will improve your performance.
Adjusts the quality of lighting. Reducing this will improve your performance.
Adjust your graphics settings based on the selected preset quality.
Reduces aliasing at a cost to performance and memory. Lower AA settings will yield better system performance.
Adjust polygonal density of characters and non-player characters throughout the world. Reducing this will improve your performance.
Increases the visual quality of textures with a lot of noise, such as grates and fences. Reducing this will increase your performance.
Adjust the quality of displaying grass
Adjust the quality of displaying trees
Switch the Upper Center Quickslot Bar with the Cover Bar when entering Cover (Smugglers and Agents only).
When enabled, looting a corpse will also collect all of your loot from nearby corpses.
Set Focus Target / Swap Focus Target
Set Focus Target / Swap Focus Target
Displays the deaths of targets killed by your character or companion in the chat panel.
Displays the death of your character or companion in the chat panel.

This enables logging of all the player's combat interactions to file.
Warning: This is a feature for advanced users that may require active disk management to ensure sufficient free disk space on the game's installation drive.
This option allows you to choose where to display your legacy on your nameplate.
Toggle the Legacy experience bar on/off.
Use Operations Frames as Group Frames
Automatically track/untrack missions when you enter a new area.
Adjust the width of operations health bars
Adjust the height of operations health bars
Toggle using operations frames as group frames
Prevents Fog of War from appearing on maps.
The alpha value the chat panel will fade to when it doesn't have focus
Fades the chat panel if there is no activity
Show Conversation Alignment Gain on Mouseover
Shows conversation alignment gain inside of the choice wheel on mouseover
Show conversation alignment gain next to the choice
Locks the quickbars so abilities can no longer be dragged off them
The value the map will fade to when moving
Toggle locking the social notification anchor
Switches invite dialogs to be social messages
Toggles attaching the social notifications to the bottom of chat
Reverse Y and Z coordinates on coordinate displays
Reverses the display of the Y and Z coordinates when mousing over the minimap.
The quickslot keybinds will respond to key press instead of key release.
Ignores the alpha set by the user and completely fades the left and right sides of the world map.
Toggles between always showing health bars and showing health bars only when it is not full.
Toggles between always showing the resolve bar and only showing the resolve bar when it has resolve in it.
Toggles between visibility of the class symbol in the nameplate.
Toggles whether the guild name is displayed below the player name in the nameplate.
As the nameplate gets further away the nameplate will scale to be smaller with this on.
Hide Adding Friends from Mission Rewards
Hide suggesting group friends from the Mission Rewards Window
Controls how many icons can gutter in the minimap, showing closest first.
This option toggles drawing of mapnotes related to missions that the player is not tracking. If selected, even mapnotes for missions that are not tracked will display mapnotes.
Allows your skin and eyes to reflect the corruption and power of the dark side.
Adjust the amount of time in advance you may queue up an ability before being allowed to use it.
Allow multiple filters to be enabled simultaneously on the World Map
This option allows enabling of all of the filters simultaneously on the World Map.
If enabled, chat panel will automatically swap to the group chat channel when you join a group.
Auto adjust camera facing when your character moves or rotates
Adjust the texture atlasing of your character model. Reducing this will increase your performance.
Controls how many characters are rendered in the vicinity of the player.
You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you wish to load the default interface?
You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you wish to exit the interface edit mode?
Are you sure you wish to delete the '<<1>>' interface? This action is irreversible.
Unable to delete a default interface.
Unable to save over a default interface.
An interface already exist with the name '<<1>>'. Do you want to overwrite it?
Unable to load interface '<<1>>'. A default has been loaded instead.

Style 1 - Bright cooldown with a dark overlay
Style 2 - Bright cooldown with no overlay
Style 3 - Dark cooldown with a dark overlay
Style 4 - Dark cooldown with no overlay
Style 5 - No cooldown graphic and no overlay
The time in seconds before the cooldown text will start displaying tenths of a second
Save the current interface as the given name
Suppress Crew Mission Rewards in a Warzone
This will suppress the crew mission reward window from popping up in a warzone. It can still be reached by clicking the reward button next to the mission tracker.
Enables you to freely move around secondary windows such as your inventory or character sheet windows.
Target cycling works in screen space from current target going left to right
Displays a indicator of the next target in the target cycle queue
How far away from player geometry and terrain are loaded and rendered; lower settings increase performance but sacrifice visual quality.
If checked, this will add a confirmation dialog before transferring a purchased item from Unclaimed Items into your inventory.
If checked, this will add a confirmation dialog before purchasing an item from the Cartel Market.
If checked, this will add a confirmation dialog before changing your appearance.
If checked, a warning dialog will not be displayed when sending a mail message to a potentially unsafe recipient.
Show Detailed Star Fighter Weapon Tooltips
Display Starfighter Fleet Requisition Spending Warning
You are about to spend Fleet Requisition. Is that okay?
Attempting to activate a Ground Target at an invalid location will not deactivate the Reticule
Double pressing Hotkey assigned to Ground Target ability activates ability at the current target's position
Attempting to activate a Ground Target at an invalid location will not deactivate the Reticule
Double pressing Hotkey assigned to Ground Target ability activates ability at the current target's position
Increases the number of shadow maps used by the shadow system. Increasing this will improve quality but reduce performance.
Enabling this will allow you to mouse click through the chat box.
Enabling this will allow you to mouse click through the chat's input box.
Increases the effective resolution of the shadows. Applies to interior and exterior shadows. Increasing this will improve quality but reduce performance.
Increases the distance you can see. Increasing this will allow you to see farther but will reduce performance.
Toggle numlock on when GSF starts
If checked, this will add confirmation dialogs for the Command Console
Display Starfighter Cartel Coin Spending Warning
Selecting this option will show personal mission progress when mousing over in-game objects.
Selecting this option will show group mission progress when mousing over in-game objects.
Selecting this option will highlight any ability that has been modified by a buff you possess.
Selecting this option will highlight any personally applied <<1>> with a duration at or under the selected <<2>> Highlight Max Duration.
This option modifies the max duration of the <<1>> you would like highlighted.
This option seperates personal <<1>> from non-personal <<1>> then sorts and displays them by the selected <<2>> Sort Type.

This option defines the sort type for the <<1>> tray.
Apply Time: Sorts by the time the <<1>> was applied. Ignores <<2>> with a duration of zero.
Total Duration: Sorts by the total duration of the <<1>>.
Time Remaining: Sorts by the time remaining of the <<1>>.
Only displays debuffs that can be cleansed.
A dialog that requires confirmation to commit your Combat Proficiencies selection.
A dialog that requires confirmation to reset your utility points.
A dialog that requires you to confirm you have unspent utility points.
A dialog that requires you to confirm an uncommitted decision.
Activates the modified outfit after the modifications have been commited.
The keybinding file already exist, would you like to overwrite it?
Are you sure you wish to delete this keybinding file?
Adjust the distance of how far grass will render.
The number of results that will appear for /who in chat before opening the Social Window
Adjust the slider for the amount of results that should be sent to chat before opening the Who List Window.
If checked, this will add a confirmation dialog before opening a Cartel Market pack.
Item Stash Entry Removal Confirmation Dialog
If checked, this will add a confirmation dialog before the removal of an item stash entry.
Galactic Command Crate Opening Confirmation Dialog
If checked, this will add a confirmation dialog before opening a Galactic Command crate.
Galactic Command Item Stash Entry Removal Confirmation Dialog
If checked, this will add a confirmation dialog before the removal of an item stash entry from the Galactic Command Item Stash.
Automatically close Inventory when using Vendors
This will automatically close the Inventory Window when the Vendor Window closes
Automatically close Inventory when using the Cargo Hold or Legacy Storage
This will automatically close the Inventory Window when the Cargo Hold Window is closed
Sets the default behavior of switching difficulties to always match the difficulty last selected.
A dialog that asks you if you want sync you difficulty preference to the difficulty just set.
A dialog that warns you that you will remove all currently accepted chapter missions when requesting a new one from the chapters window.
If checked, this will add a confirmation dialog before Disintegrating multiple item stacks.
A dialog that warns you about traveling to a mission location when pressing the LAUNCH MISSION button.
Enhanced Shadows. Toggle off for a performance gain.
Adjust this value to change the frame rate.
While leading a party, allows group members who are not the party leader or assistant lead to suggest group invites to the party leader.
When opening Cartel Market Packs the Pack Explorer will be used to show what you received.
Automatically decline all stronghold key offers
If checked, a warning dialog will not be displayed when sending a guild mail message.
While leading a party, allows the group to be challenged to a PvP match by another group.
